name: Thunder Mountain Prism Star
effect:
The attacks of {L} Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s) cost {L} less.
Whenever any player plays an Item or Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to this Stadium card.
author: 5ban Graphics
rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
